title: Wind Turbine Shadow Flicker Analysis
description: A developer needs to model the potential shadow flicker impact of a new wind farm on nearby homes.

tasks.description: Identify the locations of all nearby residences relative to the proposed turbine locations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent maps all homes within a 2km radius.

tasks.description: Run a shadow flicker model using the turbine dimensions, sun path data, and topography.
tasks.expected_outcome: Model calculates the expected hours of flicker per year at each residence.

tasks.description: Compare the results to local regulations or industry best practices (e.g., less than 30 hours per year).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that two homes are predicted to experience more than 30 hours of flicker.

tasks.description: Propose mitigation, such as programming the turbines to shut down during periods when they would be causing flicker at the affected homes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent recommends a specific operational control to solve the issue.
